author: Alex Evans
description:
With the explosion in popularity Warhammer 40k has seen since 10th edition dropped in 2023, more YouTube video makers than ever are competing for your time with their battle reports, lore explainers, painting tutorials, and more. Matthew Glanfield, co-founder of MiniWarGaming, the oldest Warhammer YouTube channel still on the air, visited our Discord community this week to explain why their business' future lies in the game's distant past.

Continue reading Why a top Warhammer 40k YouTube channel is swapping 10th edition for Oldhammer
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Why a top Warhammer 40k YouTube channel is swapping 10th edition for Oldhammer

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Final Fantasy is the most-hyped up Magic set, possibly in the entire history of the game. As such, it features some commanders that are already extremely popular, with fans rushing to pick up singles for the most sought-after.

Continue reading Five MTG Final Fantasy commanders that are criminally underrated
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Five MTG Final Fantasy commanders that are criminally underrated

author: Mollie Russell
description:
What are the best Super Mario Lego sets? Here at Wargamer, we always have Lego on our minds, but with the release of the Switch 2, many of us have been pouring hours and hours into Mario Kart World. (I need to collect all the outfits!) And so we got to wondering, what Mario Lego sets are out there? The short answer: loads. But don’t worry, we’ve compiled a list of the best Super Mario Lego sets, so you don’t have to.

We have gone for a whole mix of sets. Some are the best Lego sets for adults, and we factored in some of the best new Lego sets too to give you plenty of options. So, as they say, let’s-a-go.

Continue reading The best Lego Mario sets to buy in 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Biggest LEGO sets<
title: The best Lego Mario sets to buy in 2025

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Apart from the woefully inadequate Monk, the Ranger is the clear problem child of 5th edition Dungeons and Dragons. But whereas the 2024 ruleset update seems to have entirely fixed fans’ Monk misgivings, they are still working hard on homebrew content to repair the Ranger.

Continue reading Nine months later, DnD 5e fans are still trying to fix the worst 2024 class
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Nine months later, DnD 5e fans are still trying to fix the worst 2024 class

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Board game retailers in the Canadian province of Quebec are at risk of closure, according to a report by Canadian outlet CTV news. A Quebecoise language law requires the majority of packaging on commercial products sold in Quebec to be written in the French language - something that game store owners say effectively outlaws the products they sell.

Continue reading Quebec's board game scene could be nuked by this French language packaging law
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: Quebec's board game scene could be nuked by this French language packaging law

author: Matt Bassil
description:
With Destined Rivals freshly released and NAIC 2025 kicking off, we though it would be a great time to examine the strongest Pokémon decks. These are the lists we can expect to see making a splash this weekend.

Among the best Pokémon decks below, you'll see a number of old favorites that haven't changed much in the past few weeks, alongside brand new strategies powered by the best Pokémon cards in the newest Pokémon set.

Continue reading The 6 mightiest Pokémon TCG decks in the Destined Rivals meta

title: The 6 mightiest Pokémon TCG decks in the Destined Rivals meta

author: Callum Self
description:
While the Star Wars movies introduced the world to many iconic Jedi and Sith who are still popular to this day, the expanded universe has even more characters who - like Darth Revan, Darth Malak, Cal Kestis, and more - have their own dedicated fandoms. This extended family of force-wielders will hit the tabletop in Star Wars Unlimited’s Legends of the Force set - and I've found a great discount on booster box pre-orders if you're keen to get involved.

Continue reading Get 384 Star Wars Unlimited Legends of the Force cards at a huge discount
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best card games, Best Trading Card Games, MTG release schedule
title: Get 384 Star Wars Unlimited Legends of the Force cards at a huge discount
